cu.explanation_en: Setting the S1-U port to an out-of-range value (99999) will cause GTP-U tunnel establishment failure and prevent user plane data transmission.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to an out-of-range value (100 dBm) will cause invalid SSB power configuration and synchronization failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為超出範圍的值 (100 dBm)，會導致無效的 SSB 功率配置，並造成同步失敗。
